channel.title: Blog | Kelvin Muriuki
channel.description: my personal portfolio and blog where I share my skills and thoughts

item.title: Exploring the Power of Python Flask
item.description: Python has gained immense popularity as a versatile programming language, and when it comes to web development, Flask stands out as a robust and flexible framework. Flask provides developers with the tools needed to build web applications quickly and efficiently, thanks to its simplicity and extensive ecosystem. In this blog, we will delve into the world of Python Flask, exploring its features, advantages, and how to get started with this lightweight yet powerful web framework.
item.author: muriukikelvin27@gmail.com (Kelvin Muriuki)

item.title: Slaying Text with SED - A Beginner's Guide
item.description: As a Linux user, you're probably familiar with the command line and various tools to manipulate text. One such tool is SED (Stream Editor), a powerful utility for searching, replacing, and transforming text in a file or stream.
item.author: muriukikelvin27@gmail.com (Kelvin Muriuki)

item.title: Understanding Cron Jobs and Setting Them Up
item.description: Cron jobs are a popular way to automate repetitive tasks on a Unix-based system. They allow users to schedule scripts or commands to run at specific intervals, whether daily, weekly, or even every minute. In this blog post, we'll explore the basics of cron jobs and walk through an example setup.
item.author: muriukikelvin27@gmail.com (Kelvin Muriuki)

item.title: Setting up Jupyter Lab environment in a VPS
item.description: In this blog post, we will discuss how to set up a JupyterLab environment on a VPS (Virtual Private Server) with Nginx, a high-performance web server that can act as a reverse proxy for JupyterLab
item.author: muriukikelvin27@gmail.com (Kelvin Muriuki)
